edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.lending_system

Interface LendingManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibraryLendingSystem

    public interface LendingManager
    Interface for a lending system where the available items are stored in an inventory and where there are different users. Items can be reserved, checked out for home, and returned to the inventory. Items in the the inventory, reserves, and at home can be located by position.
    Author:
    Jo Perry

    • Method Detail

      • showInventory

        java.lang.String showInventory()
        Traverse all items in the inventory.
        Returns:
        the string representing the items in the inventory

      • login

        void login(java.lang.String id,
         java.lang.String password)
        Set the user for the current context to a given value.
        Parameters:
        id - user's id
        password - user's password
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if a patron or the admin is already logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the patron account does not exist

      • logout

        void logout()
        Logs the current user out of the system.

      • addNewPatron

        void addNewPatron(java.lang.String id,
                java.lang.String password,
                int num)
        Add a new account to the patron database. The administrator must be logged in.
        Parameters:
        id - new patron's id
        password - new patron's password
        num - number/max limit associated with this patron
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the database is full or the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if patron cannot be added to the patron database

      • getCurrentUserId

        java.lang.String getCurrentUserId()
        Returns the current user's id. If there is no user logged in, an empty string is returned.
        Returns:
        the current user's id.

      • cancelAccount

        void cancelAccount(java.lang.String id)
        Cancel a patron account.
        Parameters:
        id - patron's id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the administrator is not logged in
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if patron cannot be removed due to some error

      • reserveItem

        void reserveItem(int position)
        Reserve the selected item for the reserve queue.
        Parameters:
        position - position of the selected item in the inventory
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no patron is logged in
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if position is out of bounds

      • reserveMoveAheadOne

        void reserveMoveAheadOne(int position)
        Move the item in the given position up 1 in the reserve queue.
        Parameters:
        position - current position of item to move up one
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no patron is logged in
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if position is out of bounds

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no patron is logged in
